name: Ever Present
description:
Ever Present is a game about never giving up. You'll be faced with a variety of 2D platforming challenges, full of spikes and sawblades, which will probably kill you over and over again. Thankfully, there's a friendly narrator by your side, ever present and ready to cheer you on, and remind you to never give up!

Controls:
[LEFT] and [RIGHT]: Move around. Hold while against a wall to cling to it and slide down slowly.
[Z] or [SPACE]: Jump, press again in midair to double jump. Press while clinging to a wall to  walljump.
[DOWN]: Hold to duck, or hold after releasing movement keys to slide.
[S]: Skip game introduction

Note: Currently, using the [Z] key to jump, and [S] key to skip the introduction aren't working in the browser version of the game. You can still use [SPACE] to jump, or download the .exe where everything works just fine. I'm trying to fix this, and I'll upload a fixed version when it's available.
